amendment.description: To change the effective date for certain noise level amendments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 10 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 10 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S830-833) To change the effective date for certain noise level amendments.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 10 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Lautenberg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 10 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
